chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
y: pos n
x: pos n
Hxy: x <> y
i: nat
y': pos n
l: list bool
w: Vector.t (list bool) n
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack) // (i, v) ->> (7 + i, w)

Premises:
rev : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
move_rev_stack = POP x (4 + i) (7 + i) :: PUSH y One :: PUSH y' Zero :: POP y' i i :: PUSH y Zero :: PUSH x Zero :: POP x i i :: nil : list (bsm_instr n)
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope

empty_stack_spec : forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), (i, empty_stack x i) // (i, v) -> > (3 + i, v[nil/x])

bsm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1

Inductive bsm_sss (n : nat) : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop := in_bsm_sss_pop_E : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v) | in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x]) | in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll :...
in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])

in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])

subcode_app_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l r : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a ++ r) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
subcode_snoc_inv : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i j : nat) (a l : list X), j = i + length l -> (i, l ++ a) <sc Q -> (j, a) <sc Q
in_bsm_sss_push : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x])
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v0) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x0 y0 : pos ?n, pos_nxt x0 = pos_nxt y0 -> x0 = y0 where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x0 y0 : pos ?n, {x0 = y0} + {x0 <> y0} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
subcode = fun (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X) => let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := Q in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\ i = n + length l : forall X : Type, code X -> nat * list X -> Prop Arguments subcode {X}%type_scope _ _ /
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w0 : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w0) = (v0, w0) where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n Hxy : x <> y i : nat y' := y : pos n l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n...

```coq
intros Hv Hwv Hstep.
subst.
apply bsm_compute_POP_E with (1 := ltac:(eapply subcode_snoc_inv; [|eassumption]; reflexivity)).
rewrite Hv.
apply bsm_steps_POP_E_inv with (bsm_compute_POP_E := in_bsm_sss_pop_E).
rewrite <- Vector.add_spec, zero_Sn_eq_nil_rev.
apply bsm_steps_PUSH_inv with (bsm_compute_PUSH := in_bsm_sss_push).
rewrite <- Vector.add_spec, zero_Sn_eq_nil_rev.
apply bsm_compute_PUSH with (1 := ltac:(eapply subcode_snoc_inv; [|eassumption]; reflexivity)).
Qed.
```

original: intros Hv Hwv Hstep. subst. apply bsm_compute_POP_E with (1 := ltac:(eapply subcode_snoc_inv; [|eassumption]; reflexivity)). rewrite Hv. apply bsm_steps_POP_E_inv with (bsm_compute_POP_E := in_bsm_sss_pop_E). rewrite <- Vector.add_spec, zero_Sn_eq_nil_rev. apply bsm_steps_PUSH_inv with (bsm_compute_PUSH := in_bsm_sss_push). rewrite <- Vector.add_spec, zero_Sn_eq_nil_rev. apply bsm_compute_PUSH with (1 := ltac:(eapply subcode_snoc_inv; [|eassumption]; reflexivity)).
